item.title: Fly Tipping on 13 Reighton Road, 7th August
item.description:
Bins overflowing and rubbish dumped - not from residents of 13 Reighton Road. Lots of bags just dumped one day. Recycling has been taken but many black bags dumpe

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 7th August
item.description:
White Fiat food van R14BNR has been abandoned here for over 6 months, the MOT has expired and therefore it has no insurance. The tax expires at the end of this month . It clearly has been abandoned here due to the state it is in and will only encourage further anti social behaviour of it is not moved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Merrilees Road, Longlands, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish not collected by Harford House, 7th August
item.description:
Bunch of rubbish bags left by Harford House. Flies are buzzing around and it's unhygienic for us residents. I'm also dismayed and flummoxed as to why the bins' apertures are so narrow and don't accept bags when we are still issued and mostly all use City of Westminster recycling bags. It doesn't seem to make any sense or be joined up policy!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Tavistock Crescent, Maida Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Biffa bins and green bins, 7th August
item.description:
There were 3 x biffa bins and 5 green bins which obstructed the pavement which meant I was unable to pass on my mobility scooter. It was busy with a large lorry parked waiting to reverse into yard next door meaning it was hazardous to go into the road to get to next drop down to proceed towards the shopping centre. Have taken photo.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broadway, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household waste left on Adolphus Road, 7th August
item.description:
Duvet, pillows, clothing left on the street. The pile has been growing over the past week. Unsure if itâ€™s the same person dumping their stuff or if itâ€™s attracting more waste from others people. We are selling our flat and itâ€™s putting off buyers.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Adolphus Road, Hackney, London
